subproject.corporate outcome: National and local institutions have the capacities to reduce the impact of disasters, especially climate change related disasters, on vulnerable communities
subproject.description:
1. Livelihoods of affected people stabilized through improved agriculture productivity and income generation
2. Early local economic recovery through improved MSEs and key infrastructure rehabilitation
3. Improved local government, CSOs/NGOs and community capacity to plan, facilitate and execute recovery in Saada  
4. Gender equality and women’s economic empowerment strengthened
subproject.title: Community Driven ER Sa’ada

title: Community Driven Early Recovery in Sa’ada
